synopsis.text: Private Hyakkaou Academy, a prestigious institution where the elite gather, hides a dangerous secret - a world of high-stakes gambling that determines the students' social status. For Mary Saotome, an ambitious and intelligent girl from an ordinary background, her dreams of a glorious future are put to the test when she finds herself entangled in this treacherous system. As she navigates through the academy's rigorous hierarchy, Mary discovers that her wit and luck are her only allies in her quest to survive debtless and secure a better future for her childhood friend, Tsuzura Hanatemari, who is trapped at the bottom of the hierarchy. With the odds stacked against her, Mary must outsmart and defeat the devious student council members and rise through the ranks in this prequel to the mega-popular Kakegurui. Will Mary's perseverance and refusal to lose be enough to overcome the challenges that lie ahead? Only time will tell in this thrilling and unpredictable world of gambling.
